climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. Green Seal certified products have reduced environmental impacts in one or more stages of the product lifecycle.

features: POTENT CLEANING: If You Care Automatic Dishwasher Tablets are super concentrated and contain a potent blend of mineral and plant derived cleaning ingredients, like coconut and rapeseed, and powerful enzymes to get your dishes sparkling clean.

THE BETTER OPTION: Our tabs are non-toxic, have minimal impact on aquatic life, are free of phosphates and chlorine, and will dissolve quickly in water. The film is polyvinyl alcohol (PVA), a water soluble, biodegradable polymer, so there is no need to unwrap
DISH SOAP REPLACMENT: Use in place of large pods and liquid soap, as our small but powerful tabs contribute to reduced emissions and energy consumption related to transport and handling.

SMALL FOR A REASON: Thanks to the small size of our Dishwasher Tablets, it’s weight is reduced 45% to 55% compared to other leading brands. This means less raw materials used, stored, transported, and distributed, so there is less CO2 emission and less detergents in our waste waters
QUALITY WITH INTEGRITY: If You Care kitchen and household items are carefully crafted to have the least environmental impact possible, while at the same time, delivering the highest quality products.
body.description: IF YOU CARE Automatic Dishwasher Tablets are super concentrated. They contain a potent blend of mineral and plant based cleaning ingredients, including coconut, rapeseed, and powerful enzymes to get your dishes sparkling clean. Our dish cleaning tabs are biodegradable, non-toxic, have minimal impact on aquatic life, and contain no phosphates and no chlorine. Replace larger dishwashing pods and liquid soaps with our small but potent tabs to reduce CO2 emissions and less detergents (even biodegradable ones) ending up in our waste waters. All this, plus your dishes will shine. The film is polyvinyl alcohol (PVA), a water soluble, biodegradable polymer that will dissolve quickly in water, so there is no need to unwrap before placing in your dishwasher. Comes as a pack of 40 dish cleaning tablets. IF YOU CARE is a brand that cares about our health and environment as much as you do. That’s why our kitchen and household items are all carefully crafted to have the least environmental impact and leave the least carbon footprint possible, while at the same time, delivering the highest quality products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: If You Care knows you care. We all do. We care simply because it’s the right thing to do. Now, more than ever.

Quality with integrity If You Care kitchen and household products are carefully and deliberately crafted to have the least environmental impact and the lightest carbon footprint possible, while at the same time, delivering the highest quality and most effective results.
Our Products Baking & Cooking Household Coffee & Tea

Our Certifications If You Care backs its environmental claims with third party verification and certification by the leading national and international certifying bodies. If You Care backs its environmental claims with third party verification and certification by the leading national and international certifying bodies.

Product Free & Clear Laundry Detergent Natural Sponge Cloths Natural Dish Liquid Automatic Dishwasher Tablets Recycled Tall Kitchen Trash Bags Features Four powerful enzyme blends ensure successful stain-fighting Absorb liquids easily and quickly and release them with simple wringing Natural, plant-based cleaning ingredients Potent blend of mineral and plant-derived cleaning ingredients 13 gallon size Environmental Benefit Biodegradable, phosphate free, and chlorine free Made from 100% renewable resources and contain no petroleum or other fossil fuel products Non-toxic, no phosphates, no chlorine, biodegradable, hypoallergenic and aquatic life friendly Biodegradable, non-toxic, have minimal impact on aquatic life, contain no phosphates and no chlorine Made from minimum of 89% recycled post consumer material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These dishwasher tabs are working great for us! I ordered them on a whim when my normal eco friendly dishwasher tabs went up in price and decreased the number of tabs in the box👎. I will definitely be ordering these ones from now on. I especially love that they don't need to be unwrapped, that makes for no dishwasher mishaps and clean dishes every run guaranteed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No film on Glasses
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product for dishwashers & climate friendly. If the water isn't hot enough, there are sometimes white grains left on plastic. But it is the best dishwasher "soap" I've used for glasses. I did NOT change my rinse agent & my glasses come out sparkling.It is getting more difficult to find it. I give JF Distributions an F for the way they packaged 2 boxes of If You Care Tablets. They put them in an envelope, which was NOT waterproof. Lucky it was not raining when the delivered it. It rained soon after. One of the boxes had broken open, so there were tablets all over the inside of the envelope. The first time I ordered this through Amazon, the seller packaged it in a box & everything was good. None of the tablets broke open, so I didn't lose product, but I am wary of ordering it ever again through Amazon. Don't know who will send it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works SO WELL. Seriously--just buy it. So impressed.
reviews.reviewText: Super great performance. Squeaky clean dishes, and no plastic or weird goopy blue chemicals. Just a little tablet with a dissolving wrapper and it comes in a small, light, cardboard box, so much less waste than the traditional detergents. I keep testing it with more and more caked on "difficult" dishes/pans and it always surprises and impresses me. Way better than the major brands. HIGHLY, highly, HIgHlY ReComMend! Love these things. And they come with so many tabs. It seems to last wayyyyyy longer than the liquid crap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does the work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are fantastic
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these for about a year now. I searched these out because I'm trying to reduce plastic waste in my house. Not only are these easy to use, they are easily stored, a good price, and they work well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got it as a replacement for Ecover that was out of stock.Will buy something else, very poor cleaning. Dishes comes out looking clean but when you touch them you can feel stuff on them. And that is with a brand new, excellent dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dishwasher detergent yet!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love these pods, they work so well and absolutely no film/spots in conjunction a citric acid dish booster! We just place in our silverware holder. I’m a new lifetime customer, love the cause and clean ingredients!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ecologically responsible dishwasher pods
reviews.reviewText: I bought these because it is one of the only brands of dishwasher pods that doesn't come in a plastic bag or tub. The pods/pacs aren't individually wrapped like other products. You just toss one in and the outer film dissolves. Easy, and they clean our dishes. Simple enough. No scent that I can detect.
These work really well and best of all no overpowering artificial smell. Will be buying more.

No nasty chemical smell in dishwasher, no chemical smell on dishes either. Dishwasher is always shiny inside. some hard food stains needs to be washed before putting in the dishwasher. Not all food stains come out though.

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't clean well and leaves residue on dishes
reviews.reviewText: Was looking forward to trying these. The packaging is all cardboard and no additional plastic waste which is great. Unfortunately, the tabs leave white reside on all of our dark coloured dishes, which has to be rinsed off after. I also noticed that it was struggling to clean out coffee cups. Won't be buying again.
Tablets don’t dissolve in the wash. The plastic cover around them also doesn’t dissolve and ends up in the bottom of the dishwasher tray. The tablets leave granules of soap on the dishes.
